comments.html:
Thx for share it.
Btw today session at plnog was excellent! It was nice to hear a different (far away from marketing mumble) point of view about cloud networking. I hope you'll also share a presentation from this session.
Best Regards
comments.name: Lukasz Dorosz

comments.html: I would like also to have a look at that presentation. Unfortunately with four different tracks at PLNOG it is hard to attend them all at the same time ;)
